name: resolveTargetTaskList(for:with:)
desc: Called when it is time for you to resolve the task list to receive the new tasks.DeprecatedUse resolveTargetTaskList(for:with:) instead.
declaration:
optional func resolveTargetTaskList(for intent: INAddTasksIntent, 
                               with completion: @escaping (INTaskListResolutionResult) -> Void)
